content:
Based on our initial kick-off meeting, here's a first-pass at defining a use case:
https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=79505545#FHIROMOPOncologyUseCase-InitialUseCase:
I anticipate that this will be further scoped and refined in our subsequent meetings. In the meantime, please post feedback and comments.
Also feel free to post a new use case that we can consider for our subsequent break-out sessions and meetings.

The OMOP Oncology WG had a nice diagram for a hypothetical patient journey which might help to frame the scope of our analysis for FHIR-to-OMOP mappings: https://github.com/OHDSI/OncologyWG/wiki#roadmap.
Would welcome thoughts on this for further discussion in our next sync-up.
